main event: A cigar-shaped object was observed over Newburg, New York for approximately 3 minutes during sunset.
interesting points: The object appeared similar to a fluorescent lamp., The sighting reported no noise or exhaust from the object., The object was very high and moved at the speed of reconnaissance aircraft., The sighting occurred in a clear sky while the sun was setting., No unusual activity was reported in the area during the sighting.
witness description: a male and his wife, who noticed the object while attending a concert
